subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which famous fort is located in Jodhpur?
question_hi: जोधपुर में किस मौलिक क़मरे के बार्तावाद में है।
explanation_en: Mehrangarh Fort is located in Jodhpur, while Kumbhalgarh Fort is located in Kumbhalgarh.
explanation_hi: मेरंगारगढ़ में हैं, जो कुंभालगढ़ में हैं।
